mapper.delete: DELETE FROM product_line WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
UPDATE product_line SET is_del = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE product_line SET
product_line_code = #{productLineCode},
axle_code = #{axleCode},
assemblyline_code = #{assemblylineCode},
equipment_code = #{equipmentCode},
